5 Manfaat Minum Air Rebusan Daun Mangga
06 Nov 2019, 06:11 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Air rebusan daun mangga kini populer dipakai sebagai obat herbal untuk beragam penyakit. Berikut beberapa manfaat minum air rebusan daun mangga. (Istockphoto/ Ajaykampani)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Daging buah mangga yang manis biasanya jadi buruan banyak orang. Tapi bagaimana dengan daun mangga?Kebanyakan orang menyingkirkan daun mangga karena dianggap tak ada manfaatnya. Tapi pada kenyataannya, daun mangga terutama air rebusannya punya manfaat untuk mengatasi banyak penyakit. Kini, daun mangga yang tak akan terlihat semenarik jus mangga, makin populer dibuat sebagai rebusan daun mangga atau teh daun mangga. "Berdasarkan Ayurveda, berbagai pengobatan populer banyak yang menggunakan mangga," tulis studi dari K. A. Shah, M. B. Patel, R. J. Patel, dan P. K. Parmar tahun 2010 mengutip Southern Living."Studi menunjukkan bahwa mangga bisa menjadi antidiabetes, antioksidan, antivirus, anti-bengkak."Studi lain juga menyebutkan bahwa mangga juga membantu menurunkan tekanan darah dan membantu memperkecil risiko diabetes. Berikut beberapa manfaat minum air rebusan daun mangga secara teratur.1. Mengatasi masalah pernapasanDebu, kotoran, asap kendaraan dan rokok membuat kualitas udara yang dihirup menurun. Hal ini menimbulkan masalah pada pernapasan seperti asma dan bronkitis.Demi menghindari masalah pernapasan yang kerap ditemukan sehari-hari itu, Anda disarankan untuk rutin mengonsumsi air rebusan daun mangga.2. Mengobati disentriMeski mirip, anda tak boleh begitu saja menyamakan disentri dan diare. Baik disentri maupun diare membuat orang buang air besar dalam tekstur cair. Namun, kasus disentri bisanya disertai dengan darah.Untuk mengobatinya, Anda bisa mengeringkan daun mangga terlebih dahulu di bawah sinar matahari, kemudian rebus. Lalu, Anda tinggal meminum air rebusan daun mangga.3. Obat kumurPenting untuk menjaga kesehatan tubuh, khususnya mulut, dalam aktivitas sehari-hari. Rasa percaya diri kerap turun drastis gara-gara bau mulut.Tak perlu khawatir, daun mangga bisa menjadi solusi. Daun mangga yang biasanya jarang dimanfaatkan itu bisa dijadikan pencuci mulut alias mouthwash.Daun mangga mengandung komponen bernama tannin yang mirip dengan daun sirih. Cukup rebus daun mangga yang sudah tua hingga air rebusan berwarna kekuningan. Manfaatkan air rebusan untuk berkumur agar kesehatan mulut terjaga.4. Mengatasi batuk dan demamBatuk dan demam ditambah flu kerap menyerang kala musim pancaroba atau muism hujan. Kebanyakan orang mengalami perpaduan penyakit ini hampir tiap tahun.Untuk mengurangi zat-zat kimia yang ada dalam obat, seseorang perlu mempertimbangkan cara alami dengan menggunakan daun mangga. Caranya cukup dengan meminum air rebusan daun mangga.5. Mengontrol diabetesDaun mangga dikenal memiliki banyak kandungan nutrisi misalnya pektin, serat, dan vitamin C. Nutrisi ini akan membantu menurunkan kolesterol jahat dalam tubuh. Selain itu air rebusan daun mangga akan meningkatkan produksi insulin dalam tubuh, melancarkan distribusi glukosa dan berakibat menstabilkan tingkat gula darah. Yang harus Anda lakukan adalah merebus 15 lembar daun mangga segar dengan 100-150 ml air. Diamkan air rebusan semalaman dan minum saat sarapan. (chs)

5 Benefits of Drinking Mango Leaf Stew Water
Nov 6 2019, 06:11 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Mango leaf boiled water is now popularly used as an herbal medicine for various diseases. Here are some benefits of drinking boiled water from mango leaves. (Istockphoto / Ajaykampani)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Sweet mango flesh is usually hunted by many people. But what about mango leaves? Most people get rid of mango leaves because they are considered to be of no use. But in fact, mango leaves, especially boiled water has benefits to overcome many diseases. Now, mango leaves which won't look as attractive as mango juice, are increasingly popular as a mango leaf stew or mango leaf tea. "Based on Ayurveda, many popular treatments use mangoes," wrote a study from KA Shah, MB Patel, RJ Patel, and PK Parmar in 2010 citing Southern Living. "Studies show that mangoes can be antidiabetic, antioxidant, antiviral, anti-swelling "Another study also mentioned that mangoes also help lower blood pressure and help reduce the risk of diabetes. Here are some benefits of drinking boiled water from mango leaves regularly. Overcoming respiratory problems Dust, dirt, vehicle fumes and cigarettes make the inhaled air quality decrease. This causes breathing problems such as asthma and bronchitis. For the avoidance of respiratory problems that are often found everyday, you are advised to regularly consume boiled water of mango leaves. Treating dysentery Although similar, you should not just equate dysentery and diarrhea. Both dysentery and diarrhea make people defecate in a liquid texture. However, cases of dysentery are usually accompanied by blood. To treat it, you can dry the mango leaves first in the sun, then boil. Then, you just drink boiled water of mango leaves. Mouthwash It is important to maintain a healthy body, especially the mouth, in daily activities. Self-confidence often drops dramatically because of bad breath. No need to worry, mango leaves can be a solution. Mango leaves which are usually rarely used can be used as a dessert, aka mouthwash. Mango leaves contain a component called tannin that is similar to betel leaves. Simply boil old mango leaves until the cooking water is yellowish. Take advantage of cooking water to rinse mouth so that oral health is maintained.4. Overcoming coughs and fevers Coughs and fevers plus flu often attack when the transition season or rain muism. Most people experience a combination of these diseases almost every year. To reduce the chemicals present in medicine, one needs to consider the natural way of using mango leaves. The method is enough by drinking boiled water of mango leaves. Control diabetes Mango leaves are known to have a lot of nutrients such as pectin, fiber, and vitamin C. These nutrients will help reduce bad cholesterol in the body. In addition, mango leaf boiled water will increase insulin production in the body, launch glucose distribution and consequently stabilize blood sugar levels. All you have to do is boil 15 pieces of fresh mango leaves with 100-150 ml of water. Let stand cooking water overnight and drink at breakfast. (chs)
